game.name: Magnet Catch
game.description: A simple, slow-paced mobile-friendly game where a magnet at the bottom catches falling items. Metal items give +1 point, non-metal items give -1 point. No penalty for missed items. Items fall slowly over 2-3 seconds, keeping the game easy and never speeding up. Cute, colorful theme with rounded shapes and soft pastel colors. Score displayed at the top with simple animations.
